column2: Karanda madiththa - Kumbuk gahamula water Spring
column5: Located on Small reserve land. (Approximately 8perch) There are kumbuk & areca-nut trees. A tank (L=0.45m, W=0.45m, H=0.45) is built around the spring and the water is collected and taken to the stock tank. Water Is distributed from the stock tank. (Stock tank - H=1.5m, W=1.2m, L=1.8m)

column2: Kolongasthanna Water Spring (Near the Adawala Oya)

column5: Located on privet land (middle of the paddy). A tank (L=0.45m, W=0.45m, H=0.45) is made around the spring and the water is collected and taken to the stock tank. Water Is distributed from the stock tank. (Stock tank - H=2.5m, Dia.=6m) Water pipes here are often damaged by animals.

column5: Located in government land, About 10 families using this spring water for Drinking and bathing , Three tanks has been constructed for one is for bathing, second one is Drinking and other tank at the location of the spring.

column5: About 5 families are currently using the water, The small tank that has been constructed at the spring location is dilapidated. A water storage tank has been constructed and is in need of repair. As the water storage tank is on the roadside, a tap should be installed to get drinking water, As the tank has to be reached from the road through a canal, a slab has to be laid for it.
